original_text: Then he said unto me, Hast thou seen this, O son of man? Is it a light thing to the house of Judah that they commit the abominations which they commit here? for they have filled the land with violence, and have returned to provoke me to anger: and, lo, they put the branch to their nose.
korean_text: 또 내게 이르시되 인자야 네가 보았느냐 유다 족속이 여기에서 행한 가증한 일을 적다 하겠느냐 그들이 그 땅을 폭행으로 채우고 또 다시 내 노여움을 일으키며 심지어 나뭇가지를 그 코에 두었느니라

sentences.original_text: Hast thou seen this, O son of man?
Is it a light thing to the house of Judah
for they have filled the land with violence
and have returned to provoke me to anger:
and, lo, they put the branch to their nose.
sentences.korean_translation: 보라, 그들이 나뭇가지를 코에 대고 있도다.
